name: ApexLegendsMapRotation
0:
”Alexa, ask Apex Map Rotation to give me the current battle royale map”
”Alexa, ask Apex Map Rotation to give me the current arena map”
”Alexa, ask Apex Map Rotation to give me the current ranked arena map”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: apex map rotation
des: This skill tells you what map is played in the available modes and tells you how long it will take until the next map comes into play.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
